message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing deal on a product that's worth at least $500000. It's a steal at $1000000! I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to take on all the risk. What do you say, are you ready to make a smart investment?
I'm not ready to make a decision yet. I'd like to see more products before I make a purchase.
